categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ryleah was a Human female Imperial agent who served in the Imperial Intelligence during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. Stationed in the Network Security District on Nar Shaddaa, she tasked an Imperial spacer to sabotage the Republic's demonstration on new battle droids to use in battling the Empire.
